item.title: EP 954 - The Poltergeist Of Pain
item.itunes:title: The Poltergeist Of Pain
item.description:
Today we meet an alien who was left behind. And then we investigate a violent poltergeist of Jaboticabal, an evil spirit with vengeance on it’s mind!
